title: Who has got 100 marks in maths? - Quora

response.answer_text: The boy who didnt knew how to solve a problem but he didnt give up The girl who practised maths every night , not just completing sums after sums but actually understanding them The boy who failed in maths but had the determination to show his dad nd teachers that he can shake the world The girl who was laughed at for getting below average , she nurtured that hatred and stored it so that she can one day laugh at them All these bravehearts have got 100 Just dont give up , your time will come , and if it doesnt , then go to time’s house and pull him out Thank you Soutrik
